title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4110.6 - Place of starting time
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4110.6 - Place of starting time

State Regulations

The time shall be taken from the first horse leaving the
point from which the distance of the race is measured until the winner reaches
the finish wire. Where the horses are started from a chute, and approved
electronic or electric timing device must be used. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4110.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
